titles.title: Andrew P. Carpenter Tax Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income any discharge of indebtedness income on education loans of deceased veterans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
6/24/2015--Introduced. Andrew P. Carpenter Tax Act
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income any amount attributable to the discharge of student loan indebtedness of a veteran who died as a result of a service-connected disability.
